title: More unbeatable Black Friday cycling deals from Wiggle
content:
Cyclist
More unbeatable Black Friday cycling deals from Wiggle

Castelli riding kit, bike lights and wetsuits at up to half price – plus up to 30% off kids’ bikes – makes this November the perfect opportunity for some early Christmas shopping.

If you’re anything like us, you’ll have slid quietly into November with the best intentions of getting your Christmas shopping in the bag before the month is out. But, because we’re human and we all love to put things off until tomorrow, this invariably doesn’t happen, and you end up doing most of the present shopping in a blind panic a week before the big day.

Right, stop! Clap your eyes on the deals in Wiggle’s second week of Black Friday promotions, and nail it all in one place. New bike for the kids? Bingo. High-end riding kit from Castelli for the other half? You betcha! Hell, pick some up for yourself, too… you deserve it, right?

Wiggle started its Black Friday promotion on November 3, and after last week’s first instalment, the deals you’ll see below are Cyclist’s second weekly pick of the discounts, which run all the way to November 29.

Up to 50% off Castelli cycling kit!

Top-end Italian cycling gear at up to half price? Yes, you read that correctly. See the whole range of deals here.

Castelli Explore Velocissimo Bibtights – £70 (RRP £140) | SAVE £70!

Look great and feel great in some of the best bib tights known to humankind. These will keep your muscles warm and your core toasty when the mercury drops. Thermoflex material traps warmth, there are minimal seams, ankle zippers to keep everything secured, and Castelli’s Kiss Air 2 chamois is comfortable enough for hour after hour in the saddle.

• Buy the Castelli Explore Velocissimo Bibtights from Wiggle

Castelli Perfetto RoS Light Jersey – £93.50 (RRP £170) | SAVE £76.50!

At this rate, who’d bet against it still being short-sleeved jersey weather in late November? This jersey is more than just that, though – it’s a highly technical windproof and rain-resistant short-sleeved jersey, giving you the edge in cool, damp conditions. Packed with Gore-Tex fabric and a dropped tail to keep your rump free of road muck, it’s perfect for autumn and spring rides.

• Buy the Castelli Perfetto RoS Light Jersey from Wiggle

Castelli Gabba RoS Jersey – £104.50 (RRP £190) | SAVE £85.50!

Yep, it’s been 13 years since the original Gabba, and – as you’d expect – this newest version ramps up the tech in a big way. Fleece-backed Gore-Tex Infinium 205 material at the front keeps in body heat, keeps out wind, and boosts rain protection. At the rear, a more breathable version of the fabric calls time on ‘clammy back syndrome’. Taped shoulder seams add to the waterproofing, while there’s ample storage and a dropped hem at the back.

• Buy the Castelli Gabba RoS Jersey from Wiggle

Up to 30% off kids’ bikes!

Give them the gift of freedom this year (just don’t tell them you got the bike at a snip!). See all of Wiggle’s deals on bikes for kids here.

Vitus Nucleus 24 Youth Hardtail Bike – £419.99 (RRP £599.99) | SAVE £180!

A fabulous entry into the world of (almost) full-sized off-road bikes, this is the ideal step up for the not-so-little ones. The Nucleus 24 has hydraulic disc brakes, 24-inch wheels, Maxxis tyres, Suntour front suspension with 60mm of travel, and an eight-speed, single chainring groupset for fuss-free gear changes. That’ll be them out of the house, then, leaving you with more time for drinking sherry…

• Buy the Vitus Nucleus 24 Youth Hardtail Bike from Wiggle

Vitus 24 Kids Bike – £247.99 (RRP £369.99) | SAVE £122!

The perfect bike for those kids who are brimming over with a sense of youthful adventure! Again, this is a 24-inch-wheeler, but more of a hybrid than the Nucleus (above), giving it a sizeable dash of versatility. It also packs Shimano’s eight-speed Acera gearing, brake levers that are adjustable for reach, and a lightweight alloy frame and forks for maximum durability.

• Buy the Vitus 24 Kids Bike from Wiggle

Nukeproof Cub-Scout 24 Sport Youth Mountain Bike (Acolyte) – £599.99 (RRP £999.99) | SAVE £400!

That’s right – a whopping £400 off this stunning youth-sized hardtail mountain bike. If the ‘turmeric yellow’ paint scheme doesn’t immediately seal the deal (and it should!), it features tubeless-ready 24in wheels, an RST suspension fork, Microshift 1x eight-speed groupset, Clarks Clout hydraulic disc brakes, and top-notch Nukeproof finishing kit. It’s the real deal, at a steal.

• Buy the Nukeproof Cub-Scout 24 Sport Youth Mountain Bike from Wiggle

Up to 50% off bike lights!

At these prices, you’ve absolutely no reason to scrimp on safety. Wiggle’s range of Black Friday deals on bike lights is here.

Lifeline Pavo 840 Lumen Front Light – £34.99 (RRP £59.99) | SAVE £25!

Suitable for road bikes, mountain bikes and general commuting duties, this light attaches to your handlebars with the supplied mount, with the combined light and mount weighing just 199g. It gives a wide field of vision and allows you to switch between three Constant modes and a Flash mode, depending on whether your priority is to see or be seen. You’ll get two and a half hours of use from a full (four-hour) charge.

• Buy the Lifeline Pavo 840 Lumen Front Light from Wiggle

Exposure Zenith Mk1 Front Light – £184.99 (RRP £295) | SAVE £110.05!

More than £100 slashed off an incredible light from one of the biggest names in the business! This blinding deal nets you a bar-mounted LED light that punts out 2,000 lumens in its most powerful setting. Suited to any bike, it’ll illuminate the trails or make night-time road riding feel like daytime. Weighing just 150g, the rechargeable Zenith Mk1 offers a runtime of one to 24 hours, depending on the mode you use.

• Buy the Exposure Zenith Mk1 Front Light from Wiggle

Up to 50% off performance wetsuits!

Taking the plunge into the world of triathlon or open water swimming? These deals will take the sting out of kitting yourself out. Dive into Wiggle’s Black Friday deals on wetsuits here.

Zone3 Women’s Azure 2.0 Wetsuit – £95.40 (RRP £159) | SAVE £63.60!

The second incarnation of Zone3’s training wetsuit offers flexibility and buoyancy that makes it ideal for any level of swimmer, whether beginner or professional. Designed to minimise drag, and with 2mm neoprene for flex, the Azure is an energy-efficient way to slice through open water.

• Buy the Zone3 Women’s Azure 2.0 Wetsuit from Wiggle

Dhb Hydron Women’s Thermal Wetsuit – £100 (RRP £160) | SAVE £60!

This performance wetsuit takes the chill out of open water swimming, with a 4mm thermal lining at the back and chest to make the colder months more comfortable. Quick-release calf panels and a YKK zipper make removal simple, while 2mm neoprene construction ensure flexibility, both in and out of the water.

• Buy the Dhb Hydron Women’s Thermal Wetsuit from Wiggle

Zone3 Men’s Azure 2.0 Wetsuit – £95.40 (RRP £159) | SAVE £63.60!

This men’s version of the Azure, cut for a different kind of body shape, is identical in materials and purpose to the women’s wetsuit (above). It features a low neckline, bonded seams throughout, strategically placed 4mm buoyancy panels, plus silicone-coated wrist and ankle cuffs for easy removal.

• Buy the Zone3 Men’s Azure 2.0 Wetsuit from Wiggle

The post More unbeatable Black Friday cycling deals from Wiggle appeared first on Cyclist.
author: Martin James
